title: Assembly Elections LIVE: Rahul Gandhi declares Channi as Congress party's CM face for Punjab - India Today
content:
1. Assembly Elections LIVE: Rahul Gandhi declares Channi as Congress party's CM face for Punjab  India Today
  2. Navjot Sidhu's Message To Rahul Gandhi Ahead Of Punjab Pick Announcement  NDTV
  3. Rahul Gandhi shares ride with Channi, Sidhu, Jakhar before declaring Punjab CM face  India Today
  4. Opinion | Will Siddhu accept Channi as leader?  India TV News
  5. In Punjab, the Congress is at war with itself  Hindustan Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Assembly Elections LIVE updates February 6: The Congress will declare its chief ministerial candidate for the Punjab assembly polls on Sunday. Chief Minister Charanjit Singh Channi and Congress' state unit chief Navjot Singh Sidhu are the main contenders to be the CM face for the party though both have assured Gandhi that whosoever was chosen they will stand by the decision. Meanwhile, the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) has decided to not launch the partyâ€™s poll manifesto for the Uttar Pradesh Assembly Elections on Sunday due to legendary singer Lata Mangeshkar's demise. Also, Samajwadi Party Chief Akhilesh Yadav will visit Agra, Mainpuri and Karhal to meet party workers. Stay with Indiatoday.in for all the latest updates.
